channel.title: Telegram on Tạp chí Bitcoin
channel.description: Recent content in Telegram on Tạp chí Bitcoin

item.title: Trading Analysis Bot
item.description: Trading Analysis Bot is a Telegram chatbot for data-driven analytics of cryptocurrencies market, particularly the Binance exchange. It provides standard technical indicators, social sentiment and developer activities. Market indexes, rankings and statistic metrics based on on-chain transactions across different blockchain networks are also reported.
